<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const searchInput = document.getElementById('project-search');
  const areaFilter = document.getElementById('area-filter');
  const typeFilter = document.getElementById('type-filter');
  const tagButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.tag-button');
  const projectCards = document.querySelectorAll('.project-card');
  const resultsCount = document.getElementById('results-count');
  const clearButton = document.getElementById('clear-filters');
  const shareUrl = document.getElementById('share-url');
  const copyButton = document.getElementById('copy-url');
  
  let activeFilters = new Set();
  
  // Initialize from URL parameters
  initializeFromURL();
  
  function initializeFromURL() {
    const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
    const tag = params.get('tag');
    const area = params.get('area');
    const type = params.get('type');
    const search = params.get('search');
    
    if (tag) {
      activeFilters.add(tag);
      updateTagButtons();
    }
    if (area) areaFilter.value = area;
    if (type) typeFilter.value = type;
    if (search) searchInput.value = search;
    
    filterProjects();
  }
  
  function filterProjects() {
    const searchTerm = searchInput.value.toLowerCase();
    const selectedArea = areaFilter.value;
    const selectedType = typeFilter.value;
    
    let visibleCount = 0;
    
    projectCards.forEach(card => {
      const tags = card.dataset.tags ? card.dataset.tags.split(' ') : [];
      const type = card.dataset.type || '';
      const title = card.querySelector('h3')?.textContent.toLowerCase() || '';
      const description = card.querySelector('p')?.textContent.toLowerCase() || '';
      
      // Search filter
      const matchesSearch = searchTerm === '' || 
        title.includes(searchTerm) || 
        description.includes(searchTerm) ||
        tags.some(tag => tag.includes(searchTerm));
      
      // Area filter
      const matchesArea = selectedArea === '' || tags.includes(selectedArea);
      
      // Type filter
      const matchesType = selectedType === '' || type === selectedType;
      
      // Tag button filters
      const matchesTags = activeFilters.size === 0 || 
        Array.from(activeFilters).some(filter => tags.includes(filter));
      
      // Show/hide project
      if (matchesSearch && matchesArea && matchesType && matchesTags) {
        card.style.display = 'block';
        visibleCount++;
      } else {
        card.style.display = 'none';
      }
    });
    
    updateResultsCount(visibleCount);
    updateShareURL();
    updateClearButton();
  }
  
  function updateResultsCount(count) {
    const total = projectCards.length;
    if (count === total) {
      resultsCount.textContent = `Showing all ${total} projects`;
    } else {
      resultsCount.textContent = `Showing ${count} of ${total} projects`;
    }
  }
  
  function updateTagButtons() {
    tagButtons.forEach(button => {
      const tag = button.dataset.tag;
      if (activeFilters.has(tag)) {
        button.classList.add('active');
      } else {
        button.classList.remove('active');
      }
    });
  }
  
  function updateShareURL() {
    const params = new URLSearchParams();
    
    if (searchInput.value) params.set('search', searchInput.value);
    if (areaFilter.value) params.set('area', areaFilter.value);
    if (typeFilter.value) params.set('type', typeFilter.value);
    if (activeFilters.size > 0) params.set('tag', Array.from(activeFilters).join(','));
    
    const url = window.location.origin + window.location.pathname;
    const fullUrl = params.toString() ? `${url}?${params.toString()}` : url;
    shareUrl.value = fullUrl;
  }
  
  function updateClearButton() {
    const hasFilters = searchInput.value || areaFilter.value || typeFilter.value || activeFilters.size > 0;
    clearButton.style.display = hasFilters ? 'block' : 'none';
  }
  
  // Event listeners
  searchInput.addEventListener('input', filterProjects);
  areaFilter.addEventListener('change', filterProjects);
  typeFilter.addEventListener('change', filterProjects);
  
  tagButtons.forEach(button => {
    button.addEventListener('click', function() {
      const tag = this.dataset.tag;
      if (activeFilters.has(tag)) {
        activeFilters.delete(tag);
      } else {
        activeFilters.add(tag);
      }
      updateTagButtons();
      filterProjects();
    });
  });
  
  clearButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
    searchInput.value = '';
    areaFilter.value = '';
    typeFilter.value = '';
    activeFilters.clear();
    updateTagButtons();
    filterProjects();
  });
  
  copyButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
    shareUrl.select();
    document.execCommand('copy');
    this.textContent = 'Copied!';
    setTimeout(() => {
      this.textContent = 'Copy URL';
    }, 2000);
  });
  
  // Initial filter
  filterProjects();
});
</script>
